author: kpedro88
body:
There are a number of modules which interact with HCAL SimHits and need to process a TestNumbering ID into a standard DetId. The steps in that process don't need to be exposed to most of those modules\*. Therefore, a standardization is introduced to reduce code duplication and inconsistencies. The `HcalHitRelabeller` class is simplified to be used as a helper class, and the `relabel` function is made into a static function so it can also be used as a standalone helper function.

attn: @bsunanda, @hatakeyamak, @kencall, @lgray 

\* A few modules need the layer-by-layer information; those are left alone.
title: Simplify TestNumbering handling
